hero.careForFuture: We care about your child's future
hero.experiencedTeachers: Our experienced teachers make learning fun and effective for your child

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: For comfortable education and leisure, we unite children into small, comfortable groups divided by age categories and educational directions. We take an individual approach to each child. There are no more than 10 students per class. In-depth study of the English language. In addition, we send our children abroad for language practice. Education is from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM; three balanced meals a day (optional), and homework assignments. All conditions and comfort for your children!

threeMeals.title: Three balanced meals a day
threeMeals.description: For a comfortable time at our school, we prepare tasty and healthy food three times a day

itTechnologies.title: IT Technologies
itTechnologies.description: The 21st century is the century of information technology. Your child will learn the basics of programming, trends in the world of gadgets, and professions of the future.

mentalArithmetic.title: Mental Arithmetic
mentalArithmetic.description: We teach children to quickly perform complex mental calculations.

englishCommunication.title: English Communication
englishCommunication.description: For fluent English communication, we provide a full day dedicated to speaking practice.

foreignLanguages.title: Foreign Languages
foreignLanguages.description: Our highly qualified teachers instruct children in English, Russian, Arabic, and Chinese.

class0.title: Kindergarten Classes
class0.subjects: Mathematics, Logical thinking, Handwriting, Art studio, IT technologies, Robotics, Gymnastics, Taekwondo

class1.title: 1st Classes
class1.subjects: Calligraphy, Speech therapy, English etiquette, Conversational English, General education subjects, Sports activities

class2.title: 2nd Classes
class2.subjects: English 1 step, Chinese language, Arithmetic, Logical thinking, General education subjects, Sports activities

class3.title: 3rd Classes
class3.subjects: English 2 step, Arabic language, Psychology, Mental arithmetic, IT technologies, General education subjects, Sports activities

class4.title: 4th Classes
class4.subjects: English 3 step, French and German languages, IT technologies, General education subjects, Sports activities

contact.address: Tashkent city, Chilanzar 16th quarter, Botirma street
contact.discountOffer: To celebrate the opening of our school, we offer a 20% discount
